data.name: Oliver Demo
data.detailed_description:
Oliver is a single player 2.5D platformer with a stylized low poly design. You play Oliver, the protagonist, who can't remember his past. Explore the environment on the planet Oliver crash landed on. Fight enemies, discover items, solve riddles and most importantly, find a way back.

In the demo version you can discover the first level of the game and get familiar with its gameplay and style.
data.about_the_game:
Oliver is a single player 2.5D platformer with a stylized low poly design. You play Oliver, the protagonist, who can't remember his past. Explore the environment on the planet Oliver crash landed on. Fight enemies, discover items, solve riddles and most importantly, find a way back.

In the demo version you can discover the first level of the game and get familiar with its gameplay and style.
data.short_description: Due to an unknown malfunction of his spaceship, Oliver crashes on a strange planet. While looking for a way back, he realizes that the path ahead is full of dangers. Can he overcome them or will he be trapped on this unknown world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
